title: Loosing ip each time i log in the next day
body: I have had this issue that when i log in to league the next day , my ip decreases . I check my purchase history and says i bought nothing with my ip but it still decreases . Has this happened to anyone else and how can i fix it ?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing an issue with your client pulling the right IP values from the servers. I recommend swapping over to the Legacy Client to visit the store, as this should cause your balance to update and it should be accurate from that moment on. You can access the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Please let me know if this fixed it.
